summary.label:
LuxTrust Mobile – carry out your most sensitive online operations directly from your smartphone and without using any hard devices (such as the classic Token or a Scan).

WHAT DOES LUXTRUST MOBILE DO?
LuxTrust Mobile allows you to:
- Securely access our partner websites (banks, e-government, …)
- Confirm and validate online financial transactions
- Sign documents electronically directly 
- Perform various operations on guichet.lu

HOW TO ACTIVATE IT?
If you already are a LuxTrust customer and have your Token or Scan at hand, simply install it and follow the steps indicated in the app. 
If you are not a LuxTrust client and you want to use the app, order your LuxTrust electronic identity on www.luxtrust.lu. 

HOW TO USE IT?
LuxTrust has three main modes:
- App2App: Once set-up in your banking app, LuxTrust Mobile can automatically exchange with it so that you do not need to enter an OTP (one-time password). You just have to confirm or cancel the operation. Please check with your bank how to enable this feature.

- Scan the QR code (mosaic image) when connecting to a website using a desktop or tablet:  You will select LuxTrust mobile instead of the Token for instance. You can then scan the QR code displayed after entering your User ID and Password. The app decrypts the image and generates the OTP (one-time password) you need to insert on the website.

- Receive a Push Notification when accessing to our partners’ website from a desktop, tablet or smartphone. Partners’ websites having this feature enabled will automatically send you a notification asking you to confirm or cancel the specific operation. You can also find it under “Pending transactions”.

OTHER FEATURES
You can activate your LuxTrust Mobile app on a second device (like a tablet) and enable TouchID or FaceID to unlock it, for more convenience.

DO YOU NEED HELP?
If you have any questions or need help, feel free to contact our Helpdesk at +352 24 550 550 or by email at: helpdesk@luxtrust.lu.

SECURITY NOTICE
Before installation and as well as during utilisation, please ensure that your devices (smartphone, tablet, etc.) are appropriately secured and protected. For security reasons, LuxTrust do not accept rooted or jailbroken devices and cannot be held liable in case such devices are used.
To remain protect at all times, do not disclose your security codes, PINs, and passwords to anyone. 
If you suspect that your device or credentials have been compromised, stop using the app and immediately notify LuxTrust by telephone at +352 24 550 550. Our colleagues from Helpdesk will offer you support and guidance. 

ABOUT LUXTRUST
LuxTrust is leading European electronic identity and trust services provider. Certified and acting in compliance with the latest European regulations (eIDAS, PSD2, GDPR, ETSI), LuxTrust delivers digital services related to the identification and authentication (required to equip individuals with a valid electronic identity and to secure access to websites and applications) and the creation and validation of electronic signatures.

FEATURES

For Attendees
Attend and participate in online events while you’re on the move.
   •  Join easily by tapping the online event link in an invite email or your calendar.

For Organizers

For Panelists

HOW TO JOIN AN EVENT

   • Tap the GoToWebinar icon after you download the app and enter the session ID.
NOTE: Presenter controls can be passed to anyone in the event if they have content to share. If you’re using an iPad, you can access and present content stored on cloud services.

AUDIO
   • Upon joining an event, you will automatically connect to audio through your Internet connection (WiFi or 4G/3G).
   • For the best audio experience, plug a headset into your iPhone, iPad or iPod Touch.
   • If you prefer to dial in over your phone line, you can do that with a single tap after joining the event. 
   • If you are attending the event in person, easily disconnect from audio any time so you can continue to participate in polls and see the speaker’s presentation up close.
NOTE: Due to network constraints, iPhone users on the Verizon network will be unable to join the event and dial in over the phone at the same time.

VIDEO CONFERENCING
If additional presenters are using webcams, you will automatically see them upon joining the event. 
   • GoToWebinar presenters can turn on webcams by tapping the webcam icon then the Share My Webcam button.
   • While it is possible to stream video over a 4G/3G connection, WiFi is recommended to avoid charges with your network carrier.

The CA Mobile OTP app is an all-purpose one-time passcode (OTP) generator that provides an extra layer of security when you shop online or access online accounts. With CA Mobile OTP, you use your mobile device to generate a passcode that can be used to verify a MasterCard or Visa electronic payment transaction, or to login to an online account. This app supports EMV standards when generating the passcode for authenticating MasterCard and Visa online payment transactions. CA Mobile OTP also supports HOTP standards for generating one-time passcodes to use when authenticating to Web portals and VPNs. 

How does it work?

Your card issuer, for example, your bank or the organization where you have an online account, must use the CA Technologies authentication solution. You must sign up for the additional security with them. They will give you a link to download the account onto your device, along with your userid and an activation code. You will run the CA Mobile OTP app on your device and enter the information provided by the organization to activate OTP authentication with this organization. You then choose a personal PIN that will be used to generate an OTP for this account. The OTP can be generated without a connection to your mobile network allowing you to authenticate any time, anywhere using the one-time passcode generated on your device. When you are prompted to authenticate to your online account or to provide a passcode to shop online, you simply run the CA Mobile OTP app, enter your personal PIN, and an OTP is displayed on the device. You then enter the OTP into the application prompt to authenticate your e-payment transaction or to login to your account.

- Choisis un créneau pour un rendez-vous avec notre équipe (dans nos locaux si tu es en région parisienne ou à distance pour le reste de la France)
- Télécharge notre application et commence à recevoir des missions faites pour toi ! 


LES CONDITIONS POUR NOUS REJOINDRE
- Être majeur(e)
- Avoir une carte étudiante valide
- Être indépendant, avec le statut micro-entrepreneur par exemple : on t'explique tout sur help.studentpop.fr
- Être souriant(e) et professionnel(le)
- Être suuuuuper motivé(e) !


RETROUVEZ-NOUS ET SUIVEZ NOTRE ACTU !
- Notre site : https://www.studentpop.fr/
- Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/studentpop/
- Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/studentpop/
- LinkedIn : https://www.linkedin.com/studentpop/
- Welcome to the jungle : https://www.welcometothejungle.com/fr/companies/studentpop

Et n’hésitez pas à nous contacter : job@studentpop.fr
